title: Team Recruitment

embed.description: Welcome to the Oceanic Open Ladder 2017 Split 2!Make sure you have your teams ready to sign up, minimum 5 per roster to...

body:
Looking for a JUNGLER and an ADC. 
The tournament starts in about 3 days.
Silver and above. No bronze please.
There are prize pools to be won as well. Links above.

replies.body: If you don't find anyone for Jungle, I'm just putting myself out there (even though I'm Bronze). I doubt you'll need/want me, but if you're still desperate when the tournament starts, I'll be here.
yea man we are kinda desperado so sure u can join i'll give you our discord link https://discord.gg/f6htAW
